author: svn-role
msg: Merge the r1664084 group from trunk:
Unbounded memory usage. Regression since 1.8.x. Simple fix that keeps
memory usage limited in a loop.

author: svn-role
msg: Merge the r1663697 group from trunk:
Set svn:date earlier when creating a BDB txn.
Required for new-in-1.9 svn:client-date to work properly on BDB.
r1663697 is the fix for this problem, r1663706 and r1663749 add a test.

author: rmannibucau
msg: filling dispose param in container event for producer field

author: svn-role
msg: Longer-hand spelling is clearer and more self-explanatory.

author: arkurth
msg: Renamed utils.pm::get_connect_method_info to get_reservation_connect_method_info and changed argument from $imagerevision_id to $reservation_id. Updated all calls to this subroutine.
Added iptables.pm::sanitize_reservation. Changed call in reclaim.pm from delete_chain to sanitize_reservation to make things more generic and flexible for future modules.

Removed required $chain_name argument from iptables.pm::add_nat_port_forward. Added get_reservation_chain_name subroutine so that the chain name used for individual reservations is only defined in 1 location.
Added iptables.pm::save_configuration subroutine. This gets called from sanitize_reservation and configure_nat_reservation.
Updated utils.pm::get_vmhost_info to accept either a VM host computer name or ID.
